Issue.creator: denyeart
Issue.summary: When enabling checkpoint, ensure latest channel config in state database is deterministic across peers
Issue.description: When checkpoint is enabled with a capability flag, latest channel config will need to be re-written to state database in a deterministic way across peers. The existing channel config at key resourcesconfigtx.CHANNEL_CONFIG_KEY may not have it's content saved in a deterministic order, due to maps not getting saved in a deterministic order during protobufÂ marshaling. One approach is to take the Config directly from the ConfigEnvelope as produced by orderer, without unmarshaling and re-marshaling in each peer. Sample code for this approach can be found at https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/29766/.
